articles.title: Exercises that will help ease constipation - Times of India
articles.description: Regular exercising helps in easing constipation by decreasing the time taken by foods to move through the large intestine. This reduces the amount of water absorbed by the body from the stool.
articles.content: Besides, aerobic exercises contract the muscles of the intestine, helping to move stools out quickly.
